Build-Depends: angelscript-dev, cmake, debhelper-compat (= 13), glslang-dev (>= 12.0.0), libalut-dev, libbluetooth-dev [linux-any], libcurl4-gnutls-dev | libcurl4-dev, libfreetype-dev, libgl-dev, libgles2-mesa-dev, libglu1-mesa-dev, libharfbuzz-dev, libjpeg-dev, libmbedtls-dev, libmcpp-dev, libopenal-dev, libpng-dev, libsdl2-dev, libshaderc-dev, libsimde-dev, libsqlite3-dev, libsquish-dev, libvorbis-dev, libxrandr-dev, libxxf86vm-dev, mesa-common-dev, pkgconf, spirv-headers, spirv-tools, zlib1g-dev
